item.title: Installing Home Assistant on Ubuntu
item.description: I recently upgraded my Home Assistant server to an Intel NUC 10 Performance Kit (NUC10i7FNH) from an Atomic Pi. I needed to manually install and configure Ubuntu on my hardware there is an issue where you cannot boot from the NVMe drive. and I wanted more control over secondary storage and services. If you are looking for hardware recommendations to run Home Assistant or a small server on please check out Upgrading Home Assistant Hardware.
